contexts.context: Betreffs der Heirat zwischen Peter Erdeödy von <mark>Monyarokerek</mark> und Katharina Dersffy.
Regarding the marriage of Peter Erdeödy of <mark>Monyarokerek</mark> and Katharina Dersffy.
...cuiusdam matrimonii inter fidelem nostrum egregium Petrum Erdewdi de <mark>Monyarokerek</mark> et honestam puellam Catherinam Dersfy, camerariam serme sororis...
